landing.title: I'm Tahsin
landing.description: Welcome to my corner of the web!

introduction.title: About Me
introduction.description: I'm an experienced front-end developer proficient in TypeScript and JavaScript. My expertise includes popular frameworks such as React, Node.js, Redux, and styling with Tailwind CSS. As a quick learner with excellent communication skills, I collaborate closely with clients to craft efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions that address real-world challenges. Let's collaborate to transform your ideas into reality!

robust.title: Responsive & Adaptive
robust.description: Tailored for seamless experiences on any device, effortlessly adapting to diverse screen sizes for accessibility and visual appeal.

robust.title: Efficient & Clean
robust.description: Built on a foundation of clean, efficient code, featuring a well-organized structure, custom components, and utilities, facilitating easy maintenance and scalability for projects.

robust.title: User-Centric & Creative
robust.description: Beyond aesthetics, our designs prioritize user engagement, fostering an enjoyable digital experience for your audience.

robust.title: SEO Optimization
robust.description: Boost online visibility with our SEO-optimized approach, propelling your website to higher ranks on search engines for organic audience reach.

projectSlides.title: CrunchyPix
projectSlides.description: Initiated for my website and to showcase front-end skills. Developed dynamic components and styles. Features include international language options and smooth scroll transitions. Visit GitHub for details.

projectSlides.title: CC Order Landing Page
projectSlides.description: Created for a credit card order landing page. Designed in Figma, implemented with React table. Access controlled by API key from the backoffice application. GitHub link confidential, but can share developed components and page code upon request.

projectSlides.title: Minting UI
projectSlides.description: Developed for a UI using minting and burning functions for NNN and NVM tokens on Binance Smart Chain (BSC). Eth-2 scaffold used, contracts obtained from BSC, deployed, and ABI created. Integrated with BSC using Wagmi, enabling minting and burning functions. Other functions available on the debugging page.

projectSlides.title: KYK Eletric Inc.
projectSlides.description: My first website developed using WordPress and limited code. Developed with many custom design elements.
